entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like this original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 14.25" W x 11"H x 6"D Materials: Body - Faux Croc PU Lining - Polyester

Laptop Sleeve: 12.5"W x 9"H

Strap - Polyester Care: Spot Clean
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket

INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure (12.5"W x 9"H)
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access

PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On
